unnormalised: State Bank of India (SBI) has announced a special campaign offering home loans starting at an attractive interest rate of 8.4% per annum (p.a.). This initiative aims to boost homeownership during the festive season. The offer is valid for a limited period, commencing from 15/09/2024 and extending till 31/12/2024. Potential borrowers are encouraged to take advantage of this window.
normalised: State Bank of India (S-B-I) has announced a special campaign offering home loans starting at an attractive interest rate of eight point four percent per annum (p.a.). This initiative aims to boost homeownership during the festive season. The offer is valid for a limited period, commencing from fifteenth september two thousand and twenty four and extending till thirty first december two thousand and twenty four. Potential borrowers are encouraged to take advantage of this window.

unnormalised: The scheme is particularly beneficial for first-time homebuyers. SBI is also waiving processing fees for applications submitted within this timeframe. This can save applicants approximately Rs. 10,000 to Rs. 15,000, depending on the loan amount. This move aligns with the bank’s commitment to making housing more accessible.
normalised: The scheme is particularly beneficial for first-time homebuyers. S-B-I is also waiving processing fees for applications submitted within this timeframe. This can save applicants approximately rupee ten thousand to rupee fifteen thousand, depending on the loan amount. This move aligns with the bank’s commitment to making housing more accessible.

unnormalised: Alongside home loans, SBI is also promoting personal loans with competitive interest rates. Individuals can avail of personal loans up to Rs. 20 lakh with minimal documentation. These loans can be used for various purposes, including wedding expenses, education fees, or medical emergencies.
normalised: Alongside home loans, S-B-I is also promoting personal loans with competitive interest rates. Individuals can avail of personal loans up to rupee twenty lakh with minimal documentation. These loans can be used for various purposes, including wedding expenses, education fees, or medical emergencies.

unnormalised: Furthermore, SBI credit card holders can benefit from exclusive offers and cashback rewards during the festive season. Transactions above ₹5,000 made using SBI credit cards are eligible for EMI conversion options. This provides customers with greater financial flexibility.
normalised: Furthermore, S-B-I credit card holders can benefit from exclusive offers and cashback rewards during the festive season. Transactions above rupee five thousand made using S-B-I credit cards are eligible for E-M-I conversion options. This provides customers with greater financial flexibility.

unnormalised: For detailed information about loan eligibility, interest rates, and application procedures, customers can visit the nearest SBI branch or the bank’s official website, www.sbi.co.in. Customers can also call SBI's toll-free number, 1800-11-2211 for assistance. Remember to compare loan options from different banks before making a final decision.
normalised: For detailed information about loan eligibility, interest rates, and application procedures, customers can visit the nearest S-B-I branch or the bank’s official website, w-w-w dot s-b-i dot co dot in. Customers can also call S-B-I's toll-free number, one eight hundred-eleven-two thousand two hundred and eleven for assistance. Remember to compare loan options from different banks before making a final decision.
